adjectives.description: caverned (comparative more caverned, superlative most caverned)

entries.meaning: (poetic) Pitted or hollowed out with caverns.
examples: The wolves yelled on the caverned hill
Where echo tolled in thunder still;
[…]  he will heed as little the lofty generous enterprises that kindle upon the moral world, as a caverned bear the luminous expanse of the glittering heaven.
